Package xdi2.messaging

Support for XDI messaging documents and transport protocols.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AddOperation A $add XDI operation, represented as a relation.
DelOperation A $del XDI operation, represented as a relation.
GetOperation A $get XDI operation, represented as a relation.
Message An XDI message, represented as a context node.
MessageCollection An XDI message collection, represented as a context node.
MessageEnvelope An XDI message envelope, represented as a graph.
MessageResult An XDI message result, represented as a graph.
ModOperation A $mod XDI operation, represented as a relation.
Operation An XDI messaging operation, represented as a relation.
 

Package xdi2.messaging Description

Support for XDI messaging documents and transport protocols.
